name: Davidduc's apartment Dang Thai Mai 2
address: 90 Xom chua, Alley 12  Dang Thai Mai, Quang An, Tay Ho, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located 100 metres from Phu Tay Ho in Hanoi, this apartment features free WiFi. The apartment is 1.7 km from West Lake.

There is a seating area and a kitchen. A flat-screen TV is offered.

Tran Quoc Pagoda is 2 km from Davidduc's apartment Dang Thai Mai 2, while Quan Thanh Temple is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 18 km from Davidduc's apartment Dang Thai Mai 2.
